attributes.action: Can we keep to British Summer Time this year for more light later in the day?
attributes.additional_details: It would mean more light later in the day and may be helpful for our general mental health especially in this difficult year. Sunshine levels boost vitamin D which has physical health benefits and strengthens our immune system. This change may therefore help us be more resilient mentally and physically. As a society we have discussed this for years, so we can actively choose to make this positive change in response to the new challenges facing us now.
attributes.background: The UK government should vote to keep to British Summer Time this year to help boost our mental and physical health.
